about_the_game:
Experience just how quickly things can change as an unsuspecting high schooler who suddenly becomes the center of a government program.

Forced to traverse an unfamiliar world, you'll need to utilize your closest friendships and all of your willpower if you wish to leave in one piece.

Can you handle the pressure, or will you unravel at the seams?
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
EXODUS: Sunflower on the Horizon is a deeply compelling, original anime-style RPG. The game is reminiscent of both visual novels and RPGs- Taking with it only the best of what both experiences offer, and combining to create a unique and inventive take on a classic genre.

FEATURES
◆Unforgettable characters
◆Thought-provoking sci-fi narrative
◆Challenging, intense JRPG style turn-based battles
◆Exhilarating soundtrack

It seems someone has pulled the trigger...

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

short_description: You're given a chance to find out what really makes the earth turn... But will you like what you see? EXODUS is the ultimate sci-fi RPG about love, friendship, and deadly monsters.
